News

News

Cambridge seeks your feedback

30 November 2016

2016 Alumni Survey – an opportunity to share your views and help shape the services we offer. 

Research

Opinion: Latest Brexit legal challenge will not be ‘back door’ to Single Market

28 November 2016
Failure to invoke Article 127 of the EEA Agreement will not keep the UK in a Single Market by the back door after Brexit. The UK is only a contracting party to that agreement for limited purposes, says Cambridge professor of European Law.
Research

Environmentally-friendly graphene textiles could enable wearable electronics

25 November 2016
A new method for producing conductive cotton fabrics using graphene-based inks opens up new possibilities for flexible and wearable electronics, without the use of expensive and toxic processing steps.
More news...

Forthcoming events

Lancashire - Christmas Lunch and AGM

Thursday, 1 December 2016 - 12.00pm GMT

Come together and join your fellow alumni at Garstang Golf and Country Club for the Lancashire Cambridge Society annual Christmas lunch.

Miami - Celebrate Art Basel

Thursday, 1 December 2016 - 10.30am to 12.00pm EST
Price: $20 per person
Booking required

Thinking about going to Art Basel Miami this year? Kick off this year's international art fair with a special brunch in the Mansion of The Santa Maria. 

Northumbria - Christmas Lunch

Friday, 2 December 2016 - 12.00pm to 2.30pm GMT
Price: £18 per person
Booking required

Join the Northumbrian Cambridge Association for their annual Christmas Lunch.

More events...

Alumni Groups

With over 450 volunteer-led Alumni Groups around the world, find one near you using our online group directory. Search on the map, or by location, interest or College.

In Cambridge?

New graduates

Congratulations and welcome to our community! Take a look at the alumni benefits we offer and please get in touch if you have any questions.
